::Zardus/Killer/Annihilator/Zeus::

Zardus sighs, activating his jetpack and flying backwards out of range of 
Oblitertron. This was out of his controll. He had warned the maximals that 
their lives were at stake unless they stopped shooting his troops. They 
seemed to have ignored that warning. He shruggs.

"Alliance members," he says into his comm-link, "If the maximals open fire on 
Oblitertron, kill them."

He hovers in the air, looking at Oblitertron and the maximals.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killer opens his eyes, jumping to his feet as he hears Shuko order a retreat. 
He stumbles to Annihilator and grabs him, dragging him off toward the 
newcomer's base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zeus nods, jumping into the air and firing at Dinobot.
